nodes.text: Vercupti of sgazza boleruueé was an unidentifiable dish served in the Jedi Temple main house, a dining estabishment located at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. It was this dish that drove Obi-Wan Kenobi to try Dex's Diner, as Obi-Wan preferred less exotic meals.
The dish apears in Star Wars Galaxies under an alternate spelling, "vercupti of agazza boleruuee." This could be a typing error as the S key is beside the A key on a computer keyboard.
It appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on CZ-198 on a menu.
